oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Invitation to the Ground Breaking of the new Christian Brothers College
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ground breaking ceremonies; Invitations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The ground breaking for the new Christian Brothers College building at the intersection of East Parkway and Central took place on September 17, 1939. About 300 alumni attended the event.
